channel.title: [SOLVED] Running Errors
channel.description:
Thanks, those of you who weren't jerks and helped me instead of flamed me.
Would someone mind locking this so the other retards won't be able to continue fighting a losing battle? Thanks

item.title: [SOLVED] Running Errors
item.dc:creator: @codeusa codeusa
item.description:
@codeusa wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:11, topic:218309”][quote author=Bobsville link=topic=286867.msg2321668#msg2321668 date=1215529558]
Technically, all of the images are taken from RuneScape. Not only is Jagex not accredited with their work, but they also have mentioned, numerous times, that you may not take any images from their site without their consent.

There are a myriad of reasons why private servers are illegal. If Jagex wanted to, they could simply suit you for the above. They wouldn’t even need to go into anymore details.

Now, should we go over some more copyright laws and how most private servers infringe on Jagex’s right? (The only, ONLY reason why Jagex does not suit, I bet, is because it would cost them a lot of time and money. Also, it brings them traffic, sometimes, for those who started on a private server and moved to RuneScape or those who got fired back up into playing that horrid game again.)
[/quote]
No, private servers are not illegal. Modifying JaGex’s cache is, however.[/quote]

Oh, shit im going to jail.

Read full topic

item.title: [SOLVED] Running Errors
item.dc:creator: @Bobsville Bobsville
item.description:
@Bobsville wrote:

I am just going to leave this conversation because 90% of you think that you are gods because you can/can pretend to code in java. If you think you are bad asses because of that, then you must be some fat, lazy slob who never gets outside.

TBH, if I knew some of you a bit better, I’d probably hack you.

Bobsville, out.

Edit: Yz85Racer, I like how you responded to a post above, not the one I had just posted…

Read full topic

item.title: [SOLVED] Running Errors
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:

[quote=“Bobsville, post:7, topic:218309”]Technically, all of the images are taken from RuneScape. Not only is Jagex not accredited with their work, but they also have mentioned, numerous times, that you may not take any images from their site without their consent.

There are a myriad of reasons why private servers are illegal. If Jagex wanted to, they could simply suit you for the above. They wouldn’t even need to go into anymore details.

Now, should we go over some more copyright laws and how most private servers infringe on Jagex’s right? (The only, ONLY reason why Jagex does not suit, I bet, is because it would cost them a lot of time and money. Also, it brings them traffic, sometimes, for those who started on a private server and moved to RuneScape or those who got fired back up into playing that horrid game again.)[/quote]
No, private servers are not illegal. Modifying JaGex’s cache is, however.

item.title: [SOLVED] Running Errors
item.dc:creator: @Ryanz Ryanz
item.description:
@Ryanz wrote:

[quote=“Bobsville, post:9, topic:218309”][quote author=vic 08 link=topic=286867.msg2321685#msg2321685 date=1215530032]
Ehm, yes… Care to explain how they will freaking suit hundreds of people? You dim witted moron…

Please tell me how they would suit hundreds of people I would really like to know, they can’t suit a private server anyways, it’s not copyrighted …

God, you need to look up some information
[/quote]

RuneScape, FunOrb, and EVERYTHING Jagex owns is copyrighted, so it is illegal to copy their game, nimwad.

Also, the record companies randomly select hundreds of people a month to suit for a few thousand dollars, even though they can suit for up to $250,000. Why? It’s good business. (So watch out those of you that download pirated music.)

It would seem that you would need to look up some information.[/quote]If you care about all that shit gtfo and play real rs.

Read full topic

There are a myriad of reasons why private servers are illegal. If Jagex wanted to, they could simply suit you for the above. They wouldn’t even need to go into anymore details.

Now, should we go over some more copyright laws and how most private servers infringe on Jagex’s right? item.title: [SOLVED] Running Errors
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Bobsville, post:5, topic:218309”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=286867.msg2321599#msg2321599 date=1215526191]

You’re either missing server.class, you renamed it to something, or it’s in a different directory than from where you’re running it. Either that or it complied with errors, but you said it compiled fine.

You’d think they could realize that, but oh well.
[/quote]

I am sorry, my profession is in web design, not running an illegal server.[/quote]
Mind explaining how they are illegal?

Read full topic
